MR/SFSP – 31: Account receivable clause 
In consideration of the payment of additional premium, it is hereby agreed and declared that, 
notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this policy or in any of its conditions, the policy 
extends to cover the shortage in collection of accounts receivable resulting from insured physical 
loss or damage including accounts receivable records stored as electronic data or reconstruction 
cost of such records whichever is lower.
